com.fluidops.iwb.xml
Class JsEval

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.xml.JsEval

public class JsEval
extends java.lang.Object

handle JSON services. There are 3 kinds of JSON types: 1) plain JSON object 2) JSON script which defines a variable 3) JSON script which calls another JS function

Author:
aeb

jsPrettyPrint

public static int jsPrettyPrint(java.lang.String js,
                                java.lang.StringBuffer res)
pretty print JS and count fn call parameters

Parameters:
js - JS string
res - string buffer to pretty print into (alternative to XML output)
Returns:
the number of parameters (commas in the top level pait of parentesis)

senseJsonType

determines which type of JSON was returned by the service

eval

public static java.lang.Object eval(java.lang.String s)
                             throws javax.script.ScriptException
uses the Rhino Java engine to evaluate all 3 JSON types

Parameters:
s - JS text obtained from the service
Returns:
Either an instance of NativeArray or NativeObject if a single JSON value is returned. A List of those if a function call with parameters is returned
Throws:
javax.script.ScriptException
